text: وَمَا وَجَدۡنَا لِأَكۡثَرِهِم مِّنۡ عَهۡدٖۖ وَإِن وَجَدۡنَآ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَٰسِقِينَ
translation: (102) And We did not find for most of them any covenant;[389] but indeed, We found most of them defiantly disobedient.
footnotes: [389]- i.e., they were found to be unfaithful and negligent of Allāh's covenant.
